SamPy.cosmology.powerspec.powerspec

SamPy.cosmology.distances.cosmocalc

SamPy.cosmology.distancesÂ¶

Functions related cosmology such as diameter and proper motion distances.

Plot some distance measures versus redshift and omega_M.

requires:CosmoloPy
requires:cosmocalc
author:Sami-Matias Niemi

Functions

cosmocalc(z[, H0, WM, WV]) Calculate useful values for the supplied cosmology.
getDiameterDistances(data[, redshift]) Calculates a diameter distance in kpc / arc seconds from data for all unique redshifts.
plot_DA(filename) The dimensionless angular diameter distance DA/DH.
plot_DM(filename) The dimensionless proper motion distance DM/DH.
plot_dist(z, dz, om, dom, dist, dh, name, ...) Make a 2-D plot of a distance versus redshift (x) and matter density (y).
plot_dist_ony(z, dz, om, dom, dist, dh, ...) Make a 2-D plot of matter density versus redshift (x) and distance (y)
